UNALLOCATED
description: Symbol that signifies that an XYItemContainer's ratio is unallocated.

name: DocumentRef
description: Injection token for the Document API.

name: RootConfigRef
description: Injection token for the root configuration used to create a {@link RootLayout}

name: ContainerRef
description: Injection token for injecting the container renderable.

name: ConfigurationRef
description: Injection token for injecting the renderables configuration.

name: ElementRef
description: Injection token for injecting an HTML element associated with the renderable.

name: PatchRef
description:
Injection token for injecting the patch method generated by snabbdom.
This allows for custom modules to be added to snabbdom that are not enabled
by default.

name: docs/di/Injector.js
ForwardRef
description: An instance of a forward ref function.

name: ref
description: The reference invoked reference function result.

name: resolve
description: Resolves a potential forward reference.

name: forwardRef
description: A factory that creates a ForwardRef.

name: Injector
description: A dependency injector for resolving dependencies. Injectors are hierarchicle.

name: constructor
description: Creates an instance of Injector.

params.name: providers
params.description: List of providers for this injector.

name: parent
description: The parent injector if it is set.

name: registerProvider
description: Registers a provider with the injector.

name: get
description: Gets a dependecy from the provided token.

name: resolveAndCreateChild
description:
Creates a new injector with the given providers and sets
this injector as it's parent.

name: setParent
description: Programmatically set the parent injector.

name: resolveAndInstantiate
description: Resolves the given provider with this injector.

name: fromInjectable
description:
Creates a new injector from an annotated injectable Class.
See {@link Injectable} for more details.

name: docs/di/common.js
Token
description: A token used for dependency injection.

name: constructor
description: Creates an instance of Token.

name: docs/di/decorators.js
Inject
description:
Marks a param to be injected with the registered provider
registered with the token.

name: Optional
description: Marks a dependency as optional. Returns null if not found.

name: Lazy
description:
Marks a dependency as lazy. Injects a function that will
resolve the dependency.

name: Self
description:
Will only check the injector creating the dependency. It will not
check any parents.

name: Injectable
description:
Marks a dependency as injectable. When the dependency is created using
`Injector.fromInjectable` the dependency can define some scoped dependencies.

provide

ConfiguredRenderable
description:
A container that holds a Renderable class and a configuration to
use when it is instanatiated.

unknown.tagValue: T A subclass of a renderable.

name: constructor
description: Creates an instance of ConfiguredRenderable.

name: renderable
description: The renderable to instantiate.

name: config
description: The configuration for the renderable.

name: resolve
description: Resolves a renderable class from a configured renderable or renderable instance.

name: resolveConfiguration
description: Resolves a configuration from a configured renderable.

name: inList
description: Determines whether a resolved renderable is within a list of resolved renderables.

name: docs/dom/Renderable.js
Renderable
description: The base renderable that all other renderables extend from.

name: container
description: This renderables container or null if none.

name: width
description: This renderables width in pixels.

name: height
description: This renderables height in pixels.

name: offsetX
description: This renderables page offset x.

name: offsetY
description: This renderables page offset y.

name: isDestroyed
description: Whether this renderable is destroyed.

name: uid
description: A unique identifier for this renderable.

name: length
description: The amount of content items belonging to this renderable.

name: injector
description: The injector used to create this renderable.

name: initialize
description: Invoked when the Injector has been assigned and ready for use.

name: resize
description: Sets this components size and triggers it's childrens sizing.

name: getChildren
description:
Returns this renderables children renderables. This differs
from content items as children should contain all renderables
we want as part of the render cycle.

name: isVisible
description: Determines whether this renderable is visible.

name: destroy
description: Destroys this renderable and all it's children.

name: getParent
description:
Gets this renderables parent or any parent that is
an instance of the passed in constructor. If non is found
then null is returned.

name: getParents
description:
Gets this renderables parents or any parents that are
an instance of the passed in constructor.

name: setContainer
description: Sets the container of this renderable.

name: subscribe
description: Subscribes to a BusEvent.

name: emit
description: Emits a BusEvent on this renderable.

name: emitDown
description:
Emits a BusEvent down to all descendants recursively.
Propagation can be stopped by any descending renderable.

name: emitUp
description:
Emits a BusEvent up to all parents recursively.
Propagation can be stopped by any parent renderable.

name: getDescendants
description: Gets all descendants of this renderable recursively.

name: replaceChild
description: Replaces a content item on this renderable with another content item.

name: addChild
description: Adds a child item to this renderable.

name: removeChild
description: Removes a content item from this renderable.

name: remove
description:
Removes this item from it's parent. If there is no
parent then this renderable will just be destroyed.

name: getIndexOf
description: Gets the index of a content renderable.

name: getAtIndex
description: Gets a content renderable at an index.

name: scope
description: Creates an Observable scoped to a specific event type.

name: contains
description: Whether a renderable is a descendant of this renderable.

name: isContainedWithin
description: Whether this renderable is a descendant of another renderable.

name: getArea
description: Gets the renderable area of this renderable.

name: createChild
description: Creates a child renderable using this renderable as it's container.

name: handleDropCleanup
description: Handles any cleanup from a drop.

name: isDroppable
description: Whether this renderable can be dropped on.

name: docs/dom/RenderableArea.js
RenderableArea
description: A class that defines an area in pixels.

name: x
description: The left x position.

name: x2
description: The right x position.

name: y
description: The top y position.

name: y2
description: The bottom y position.

name: width
description: The width of the area.

name: height
description: The height of the area.

name: surface
description: The surface of the area.

name: clampX
description: Clamps a value to the x axis bounds. (x, x2)

name: clampY
description: Clamps a value to the y axis bounds. (y, y2)

name: docs/dom/RenderableInjector.js
INJECTOR_KEY
description: Key used to assign the injector to on Renderables.

name: RenderableInjector
description: An injector created for renderables.

name: fromRenderable
description:
Creates an injector from a ConfiguredRenderable, a Renderable constructor or a Renderable instance.
The renderable is registered under the `ConfiguredRenderable` token and the configuration is under the
`ConfigurationRef` token.

name: docs/dom/Renderer.js
Renderer
description: Renders the layout.

name: constructor
description: Creates an instance of Renderer.

name: initialize
description: Initializes the renderer with the containing DOM element to mount to.

name: useNodeGenerator
description: Sets a the function that generates the virtual DOM tree.

name: render
description: Updates the DOM with the current state of the renderable tree.

name: destroy
description: Destroys the renderer.

name: reset
description: Resets the render state. A full rerender of the DOM will apply on the next render.

name: detach
description: Detatches the renderer and it's DOM node from the containing element.

MemoizeFrom

A decorator that memoizes a functions computation based on the current
and previous value of other parameters.

name: docs/dom/esdoc.js
content:
/**
 * @typedef {Object} BaseModificationArgs
 * @property {boolean} [render] Whether to invoke the render cycle. This is useful for delaying the render cycle to a later time.
 */

/**
 * @typedef {BaseModificationArgs} RemoveChildArgs
 * @property {boolean} [destroy] Whether to destroy the child being removed.
 */

/**
 * @typedef {BaseModificationArgs} AddChildArgs
 * @property {number} [index] What index to add the child renderable to. If not provided then it will be pushed.
 * @property {boolean} [resize] Whether to invoke a resize of this renderable.
 */

properties.name: render
properties.description: Whether to invoke the render cycle. This is useful for delaying the render cycle to a later time.

properties.name: destroy
properties.description: Whether to destroy the child being removed.

properties.name: index
properties.description: What index to add the child renderable to. If not provided then it will be pushed.

properties.name: resize
properties.description: Whether to invoke a resize of this renderable.

docs/esdoc.js

properties.name: host
properties.description: The host object for the event.

properties.name: threshold
properties.description: The threshold before the dragging should start.

properties.name: dragArea
properties.description: The area of the item being dragged.

name: DropTarget
description: An interface that signifies the renderable can handle drops.

name: handleDrop
description: Handles an item being dropped on this Renderable.

name: getHighlightCoordinates
description: Calculates the highlight coordinates for the drop target.

name: onDropHighlightExit
description: Invoked when the item is no longer a drop target.

name: DragEvent
description: An event interface that is emitted from a {@link Draggable}.

name: host
description: The object being dragged.

name: x
description: The current delta x coordinates.

name: y
description: The current delta y coordinates.

name: pageX
description: The current page x offset.

name: status

name: docs/events/BeforeDestroyEvent.js
BeforeDestroyEvent
description:
Event fired before an item is destroyed. Mostly used in a {@link View}.
This event allows the user to cancel the destruction of a Renderable. For example,
if a tab is closed this event will be fired and sent down the tree and subscribed
to by a view. The view can perform an async clean up task or display a confirm to the user
before actually destroying the Renderable.

name: docs/events/BusEvent.js
BusEvent
description: An event that can be dispatched from the event bus.

name: constructor
description: Creates an instance of BusEvent.

name: target
description: The target of the event.

name: origin
description: The origin event.

name: isPropagationStopped
description: Whether the propagation of this event is stopped.

name: options
description: The options provided to this event.

name: done
description: A Promise that resolves when the event is 'done'.

name: wait
description:
Adds a function that will execute and hold up the finishing of this event
until the given promise resolves. These are executed in the order the are received.

name: delegate
description:
Creates a new event with a new target and setting this event as the _parent
of the new event. This will merge options with the previou event.

name: stopPropagation
description: Stops the propagation of the event.

name: dispatch
description: Implements how this event is dispatched on the given event bus.

name: docs/events/CancelAction.js
CancelAction
description:
An class that is thrown when a Cancellable is cancelled. This is used
to distinguish between a cancel action and an actual runtime error.

name: docs/events/Cancellable.js
Cancellable
description: An event that can be cancelled.

name: cancel
description: Cancels the event. Only valid within the context of the `wait` method.

name: results
description: Creates an observable that waits for the results of the event.

name: docs/events/EventBus.js
EventBus
description: Custom eventing bus that abstracts common patterns between events.

name: constructor
description: Creates an instance of EventBus.

name: subscribe
description: Subscribes to a specific event type.

name: scope
description: Creates an observable scoped to a specific event type.

name: next
description: Dispatches an event.

docs/stack/esdoc.js
content:
/**
 * @typedef {Object} StackTabConfig
 * @property {number} maxSize The max size of the tab in pixels.
 * @property {string} title The title of the tab.
 */

/**
 * @typedef {Object} StackTabConfigArgs
 * @property {number} [maxSize] The max size of the tab in pixels.
 * @property {string} [title] The title of the tab.
 */

/**
 * @typedef {Object} StackConfig
 * @property {StackItemContainerConfig[]} children Stack item configurations.
 * @property {number} startIndex The starting index item.
 * @property {XYDirection} direction The direction of the Stack.
 * @property {boolean} reverse Display header on opposite side of the Stack.
 * @property {StackHeaderConfigArgs|null} header Stack header configuration.
 * @property {RenderableArg<StackControl>[]} controls List of Stack controls to use.
 */

/**
 * @typedef {Object} StackConfigArgs
 * @property {StackItemContainerConfig[]} children Stack item configurations.
 * @property {number} [startIndex=0] The starting index item.
 * @property {XYDirection} [direction=XYDirection.X] The direction of the Stack.
 * @property {boolean} [reverse=false] Display header on opposite side of the Stack.
 * @property {StackHeaderConfigArgs|null} [header=null] Stack header configuration.
 * @property {RenderableArg<StackControl>[]} [controls=[]] List of Stack controls to use.
 */

/**
 * @typedef {Object} StackItemContainerConfig
 * @property {RenderableArg<Renderable>} use The Renderable to use for this item.
 * @property {string} [title] The title of this item.
 * @property {boolean} [droppable=true] Whether the item can be dropped on.
 * @property {boolean} [draggable=true] Whether the item can be dragged.
 * @property {boolean} [closeable=true] Whether the item can be closed.
 * @property {RenderableArg<TabControl>[]} [tabControls=[]] List of TabControls to use.
 */

properties.name: maxSize
properties.description: The max size of the tab in pixels.

properties.name: maxSize
properties.description: The max size of the tab in pixels.

properties.name: reverse
properties.description: Display header on opposite side of the Stack.

properties.name: controls
properties.description: List of Stack controls to use.

properties.name: reverse
properties.description: Display header on opposite side of the Stack.

properties.name: controls
properties.description: List of Stack controls to use.

properties.name: use
properties.description: The Renderable to use for this item.

properties.name: droppable
properties.description: Whether the item can be dropped on.

properties.name: draggable
properties.description: Whether the item can be dragged.

properties.name: closeable
properties.description: Whether the item can be closed.

name: docs/view/View.js
View
description: A renderable that renders a component.

name: constructor
description: Creates an instance of View.

name: visibilityChanges
description: Notifies when the visibility of this view changes.

name: sizeChanges
description: Notifies when the dimensions of this view changes.

name: viewContainerCreated
description: Notifies when the view container is resolved.

name: lazy
description: Whether this view is configured to be lazy.

name: isCacheable
description: Whether this view in configured to be cacheable.

name: ref
description: The 'ref' string this view is configured with.

name: resolution
description: The resolution strategy this view is configured with.

name: token
description: The token this view is using for registration.

name: close
description: Closes this view.

name: makeVisible
description: Makes this view visible.

name: minimize
description: Minimizes this view if applicable.

name: resolveConfigProperty
description:
Resolves a views config property. Checks the configuration given to the
view renderable first then checks the component metadata.

name: _postRender
description: Invoked on every render cycle.

name: _onCreate
description: Invoked when snabbdom has created the HTML element for this view.

name: configure
description: Configures a view.

name: docs/view/ViewContainer.js
ViewContainer
description:
A container that holds a 1 to 1 relationship with a component instance. This instance
is the main API for a component to interact with the layout framework.

name: constructor
description: Creates an instance of ViewContainer.

name: _element
description:
This element is the mount point that views can mount to.
The node created by the render method gets recreated when moved
somewhere else in the tree. This element is constant.

name: id
description: A unique identifier for this instance.

name: beforeDestroy
description:
Notifies that the view is being destroyed. This action is cancellable or can be halted until
an async action is complete.

name: destroyed
description: Notifies when the view is destroyed.

name: visibilityChanges
description: Notifies when the visibility of this view changes.

name: sizeChanges
description: Notifies when the dimensions of this views container has changed.

name: status
description: Notifies when the status of this component changes.

name: initialized
description: Contains the state of ths views initialized state.

name: containerChange
description: Notifies when this container has changed the {@link View} it is associated with.

name: attached
description: Notifies when the view has become attached.

name: detached
description: Notifies when the view has become detached.

name: componentReady
description: Notifies when the component is assigned to the container and ready for access.

name: componentInitialized
description: Notifies when the component is initialized.

name: width
description: Current width in pixels.

name: height
description: Current height in pixels.

name: component
description: The component instance associated with this container.

name: isCacheable
description: Whether the container is cacheable.

name: element
description: The HTML element for this container.

name: get
description:
Get's a token from this containers injector. Note, this should not be used to grab
parent renderables or any item that can be changed.

name: destroy
description: Destroys the container.

name: ready
description:
Waits for the component to be ready. If the component is not initialized
it will be initialized. This is important when the view is lazy and hasn't
been shown yet but we need to interact with the component.

name: initialize
description: Initializes the component. This creates the component.

name: setView
description: Sets the containing {@link View} for this container.

name: getParent
description:
Gets this renderables parent or any parent that is
an instance of the passed in constructor. If non is found
then null is returned.

name: getParents
description:
Gets this renderables parents or any parents that are
an instance of the passed in constructor.

name: makeVisible
description: Signals up the tree to make this {@link View} visible.

name: isVisible
description: Determines whether this renderable is visible.

name: close
description: Closes this view.

name: mountTo
description: Mounts this containers element to the given element.

name: mount
description: Mounts an element to this containers element.

name: mountHTML
description: Sets all the content of this containers element to the given HTML string.

name: detach
description: Detaches this container from it's view.

name: _onViewDestroy
description: Invoked when the view renderable is destroyed.

name: _executeHook
description: Executes a hook on the component.

name: _onComponentReady
description: Invoked when the component is resolved from the initialization.

name: docs/view/ViewFactory.js
ViewFactory
description: Responsible for creating view containers from view configurations.

name: create
description: Creates a view container from the given configuration.

name: getTokenFrom
description:
Gets the token from a view config. If using `useClass` the class will be used as the token.
Any other type will require token to be provided.

name: resolveConfigProperty
description: Resolves a config property by looking at the view config then the components metadata config.

unknown.tagValue: T The type of the value expected.

name: resolveMetaConfigProperty
description: Resolves a config property from the tokens metadata.

name: docs/view/ViewLinker.js
ViewLinker
description:
This service wires up a class instance with custom behavior for dealing with communication
between multiple views. The instance is usually decorated with decorators that describe the
actions needing to be performed. Such actions are resolving a view, inserting {@link Renderable}s into
the current layout, or querying for specific views and interacting with them.

Due to the async nature of component resolution, it is important to never store the component instances
as they could change over the course of the layouts lifecycle. This is why we set up a `ViewResolve` to
get the component we want.

name: autowire
description: Wires all types of custom behavior for linker

unknown.tagValue: {Subscription} A subscription for all streams created.

return.description: A subscription for all streams created.

name: wireQuery
description: Wires a query on the instance using the provided config.

name: wireInsert
description: Wires a view insert on the instance using the provided config.

name: wireResolve
description: Wires a resolve method with the given config.

name: readMetadata
description: Reads metadata from a class instance.

name: readQuery
description:
Reads a query observable from the view manager. A `ViewQuery` decorated method can be given a different
argument depending on how you need to interact with the view. If we need the component then the
query will wait until the component is in a ready state. If we need the {@link ViewContainer} then it
will be given to us regardless of whether the component is ready or not. We can also request the query
observable instead if we want some custom resolution logic.

name: docs/view/ViewManager.js
subscribeToQuery
description: Notifies when the a view is registered matching the given query.

name: docs/view/ViewSerializer.js
docs/view/common.js
docs/view/decorators.js
ViewComponent
description: Registers view metadata with a component class.

name: ViewQuery
description: Sets up a view query with the decorated method as the callback to receive the query results.

name: ViewLinkInit
description:
Sets up an init method that is invoked at the time a view is linked by the {@link ViewLinker}. Any dependencies need
from the Layouts DI can be injected.

params.name: injections
params.description: Injection tokens for services needing to be injected into the controller.

name: ViewInsert
description: Sets up a view insert method.

name: ViewResolve
description: Sets up a view resolve method.

name: docs/view/hooks/ViewHookExecutor.js
ViewHookExecutor
description: Executes view hooks on a component instance.

name: execute
description:
Invokes the view hook on the instance with the given argument.
This will also invoke any interceptors for the hook as well after the hook
on the component has been invoked.

name: registerInterceptor
description: Registers an interceptor for a hook on a given instance.

name: linkObservers
description: Links a resolved view container to any hook observables. Metadata is read from the given target.

unknown.tagValue: T The component type for the view container.

name: docs/view/hooks/common.js
docs/view/hooks/decorators.js
ObserveViewHook
description:
Creates an {@link Observable} that emits when the provided hook is invoked. The value emitted
is the argument given to the hook. The hook completes when the view container is destroyed.

params.name: hook
params.description: The name of the hook. If an invalid hook name is given no value is emitted.

name: docs/view/hooks/index.js
docs/view/index.js
